creator: sorlov@mdi.ru
jeremias@apache.org
text:
While the error message "TIFFImage10" is absolutely unhelpful (it probably means
"Compression method invalid"), I don't think this change would help in any way.
8 is not a well-defined value for TIFFImage. I don't know where you have this
value from.

If anyone disagrees with my view here, please reopen.
